TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

Docs.summary: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource. The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>. An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made. The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision.
|Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A>|The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A>|A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>|A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A>|The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.|

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> property to `null`.

The property is set and the property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddClaimsToList(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddClaimsToList (claims As IList(Of Claim))

Docs.param: An of type that contains the set of claims to add to.
Docs.summary: Adds claims based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter for each action specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> property. Each claim that is added to the collection is based on the action, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> properties. The claim resource type is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
